Package Logic

Class Board

java.lang.Object
Logic.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The logic of the game board, handles movements

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Board​(int size)
    Constructor of Board class initializes the board as a 2D array with 0 values except for two tiles, which have 2 value

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void doMagic​(java.util.List<Tile> list, boolean test)
    Calculates the values of the given tile list according to the 2048 game rules, moves and merges the tiles where it's possible
    int getBoardSize()
    Returns the size of the board
    boolean getCannotMove()
    Checks if the player can make any moves that changes the board through testing every move the player can make
    boolean getGameEnded()
    Checks if the board is in the game ended state
    int getScore()
    Returns the score of the game at the moment
    Tile getTileAt​(Position pos)
    Returns the Tile at the position given in the parameterlist
    void moveBoardDown()
    Moves the board down, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game
    void moveBoardLeft()
    Moves the board left, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game
    void moveBoardRight()
    Moves the board right, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game
    void moveBoardUp()
    Moves the board up, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game
    void spawnTile()
    Sets the value of a randomly choosen tile to 2

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Board

      public Board​(int size)
      Constructor of Board class initializes the board as a 2D array with 0 values except for two tiles, which have 2 value
      Parameters:
      size - : the board will be size x size (int)

      public void spawnTile()
      Sets the value of a randomly choosen tile to 2

      public Tile getTileAt​(Position pos)
      Returns the Tile at the position given in the parameterlist

    • getGameEnded

      public boolean getGameEnded()
      Checks if the board is in the game ended state
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false if not (boolean)

    • getCannotMove

      public boolean getCannotMove()
      Checks if the player can make any moves that changes the board through testing every move the player can make
      Returns:
      true if there weren't any changes in the test board after all the moves, fasle if there were (boolean)

    • moveBoardUp

      public void moveBoardUp()
      Moves the board up, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game

    • moveBoardDown

      public void moveBoardDown()
      Moves the board down, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game

    • moveBoardRight

      public void moveBoardRight()
      Moves the board right, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game

    • moveBoardLeft

      public void moveBoardLeft()
      Moves the board left, checks if it can spawn a new tile, and if the move ended the game

    • doMagic

      public void doMagic​(java.util.List<Tile> list, boolean test)
      Calculates the values of the given tile list according to the 2048 game rules, moves and merges the tiles where it's possible
      Parameters:
      list - : the row/column of tiles we want to do the operation with
      test - : if the method is called in a test function, the scoreboard shouldn't change (boolean)
